org.efaps.db.databases.information

Class ColumnInformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.efaps.db.databases.information.ColumnInformation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class ColumnInformation
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Stores information about one column within a table.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    The eFaps Team

      • ColumnInformation

        protected ColumnInformation(String _name,
                 Set<AbstractDatabase.ColumnType> _types,
                 int _size,
                 int _scale,
                 boolean _isNullable)
        Constructor to initialize all instance variables.
        Parameters:
        _name - name of column
        _types - set of column types
        _size - size/precision of column
        _scale - sclae of the column
        _isNullable - is the column nullable

    • Method Detail

      • getNullValueSelect

        public String getNullValueSelect()
        Returns for the first found column type in types the related SQL select statement for null values.
        Returns:
        null value select statement
        See Also:
        types

      • getName

        public String getName()
        This is the getter method for instance variable name. The method returns the name of the SQL column always in upper case.
        Returns:
        value of instance variable name
        See Also:
        name

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        This is the getter method for instance variable size. The method returns the column size for this column (used for string column types defined for eFaps column types AbstractDatabase.ColumnType.STRING_LONG and AbstractDatabase.ColumnType.STRING_SHORT). Or the precision/size of this column (used for decimal column types AbstractDatabase.ColumnType.DECIMAL)
        Returns:
        value of instance variable size
        See Also:
        size

      • getScale

        public int getScale()
        Getter method for instance variable scale. The method returns the scale of this column. The information is used for decimal column types AbstractDatabase.ColumnType.DECIMAL.
        Returns:
        value of instance variable scale

      • isNullable

        public boolean isNullable()
        This is the getter method for instance variable isNullable. The method returns true, if a null value for this column is allowed.
        Returns:
        value of instance variable isNullable
        See Also:
        isNullable

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Returns string representation of this class instance. The information includes name, types, size and isNullable.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        String representation of this class
